dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT (CASE WHEN COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 1 THEN a.shipment_gid END) > 0 THEN ROUND(ROUND(SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 1 THEN NVL((SELECT SUM(ssu.unit_net_weight_base) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = a.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1),0) ELSE 0 END)) / 2204.5855379, 0) / COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 1 THEN a.shipment_gid END), 0) ELSE 0 END) jan_mtb, (CASE WHEN COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 2 THEN a.shipment_gid END) > 0 THEN ROUND(ROUND(SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 2 THEN NVL((SELECT SUM(ssu.unit_net_weight_base) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = a.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1),0) ELSE 0 END)) / 2204.5855379, 0) / COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 2 THEN a.shipment_gid END), 0) ELSE 0 END) feb_mtb, (CASE WHEN COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 3 THEN a.shipment_gid END) > 0 THEN ROUND(ROUND(SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 3 THEN NVL((SELECT SUM(ssu.unit_net_weight_base) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = a.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1),0) ELSE 0 END)) / 2204.5855379, 0) / COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 3 THEN a.shipment_gid END), 0) ELSE 0 END) mar_mtb, (CASE WHEN COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 4 THEN a.shipment_gid END) > 0 THEN ROUND(ROUND(SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 4 THEN NVL((SELECT SUM(ssu.unit_net_weight_base) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = a.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1),0) ELSE 0 END)) / 2204.5855379, 0) / COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 4 THEN a.shipment_gid END), 0) ELSE 0 END) apr_mtb, (CASE WHEN COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 5 THEN a.shipment_gid END) > 0 THEN ROUND(ROUND(SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 5 THEN NVL((SELECT SUM(ssu.unit_net_weight_base) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = a.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1),0) ELSE 0 END)) / 2204.5855379, 0) / COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 5 THEN a.shipment_gid END), 0) ELSE 0 END) may_mtb, (CASE WHEN COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 6 THEN a.shipment_gid END) > 0 THEN ROUND(ROUND(SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 6 THEN NVL((SELECT SUM(ssu.unit_net_weight_base) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = a.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1),0) ELSE 0 END)) / 2204.5855379, 0) / COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 6 THEN a.shipment_gid END), 0) ELSE 0 END) jun_mtb, (CASE WHEN COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 7 THEN a.shipment_gid END) > 0 THEN ROUND(ROUND(SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 7 THEN NVL((SELECT SUM(ssu.unit_net_weight_base) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = a.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1),0) ELSE 0 END)) / 2204.5855379, 0) / COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 7 THEN a.shipment_gid END), 0) ELSE 0 END) jul_mtb, (CASE WHEN COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 8 THEN a.shipment_gid END) > 0 THEN ROUND(ROUND(SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 8 THEN NVL((SELECT SUM(ssu.unit_net_weight_base) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = a.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1),0) ELSE 0 END)) / 2204.5855379, 0) / COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 8 THEN a.shipment_gid END), 0) ELSE 0 END) aug_mtb, (CASE WHEN COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 9 THEN a.shipment_gid END) > 0 THEN ROUND(ROUND(SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 9 THEN NVL((SELECT SUM(ssu.unit_net_weight_base) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = a.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1),0) ELSE 0 END)) / 2204.5855379, 0) / COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 9 THEN a.shipment_gid END), 0) ELSE 0 END) sep_mtb, (CASE WHEN COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 10 THEN a.shipment_gid END) > 0 THEN ROUND(ROUND(SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 10 THEN NVL((SELECT SUM(ssu.unit_net_weight_base) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = a.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1),0) ELSE 0 END)) / 2204.5855379, 0) / COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 10 THEN a.shipment_gid END), 0) ELSE 0 END) oct_mtb, (CASE WHEN COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 11 THEN a.shipment_gid END) > 0 THEN ROUND(ROUND(SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 11 THEN NVL((SELECT SUM(ssu.unit_net_weight_base) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = a.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1),0) ELSE 0 END)) / 2204.5855379, 0) / COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 11 THEN a.shipment_gid END), 0) ELSE 0 END) nov_mtb, (CASE WHEN COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 12 THEN a.shipment_gid END) > 0 THEN ROUND(ROUND(SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 12 THEN NVL((SELECT SUM(ssu.unit_net_weight_base) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = a.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1),0) ELSE 0 END)) / 2204.5855379, 0) / COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 12 THEN a.shipment_gid END), 0) ELSE 0 END) dec_mtb FROM (SELECT DISTINCT s.shipment_gid, s.sail_date FROM shipment s INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON s.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN ob_order_base oob ON ssul.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid INNER JOIN shipment_refnum sref ON s.shipment_gid = sref.shipment_gid AND sref.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOC_CODE' WHERE s.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/BCO' AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND oob.order_base_xid like 'S%' AND TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'YYYY')) = TO_NUMBER(:YEAR)) a

SELECT a.shp_loc, ROUND(SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 1 THEN NVL((SELECT SUM(ssu.unit_net_weight_base) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = a.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1),0) ELSE 0 END)) / 2204.5855379, 0) jan_ton, ROUND(SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 2 THEN (SELECT SUM(ssu.unit_net_weight_base) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = a.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1) ELSE 0 END)) / 2204.5855379, 0) feb_ton, ROUND(SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 3 THEN NVL((SELECT SUM(ssu.unit_net_weight_base) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = a.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1),0) ELSE 0 END)) / 2204.5855379, 0) mar_ton, ROUND(SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 4 THEN (SELECT SUM(ssu.unit_net_weight_base) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = a.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1) ELSE 0 END)) / 2204.5855379, 0) apr_ton, ROUND(SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 5 THEN NVL((SELECT SUM(ssu.unit_net_weight_base) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = a.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1),0) ELSE 0 END)) / 2204.5855379, 0) may_ton, ROUND(SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 6 THEN NVL((SELECT SUM(ssu.unit_net_weight_base) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = a.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1),0) ELSE 0 END)) / 2204.5855379, 0) jun_ton, ROUND(SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 7 THEN NVL((SELECT SUM(ssu.unit_net_weight_base) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = a.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1),0) ELSE 0 END)) / 2204.5855379, 0) jul_ton, ROUND(SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 8 THEN NVL((SELECT SUM(ssu.unit_net_weight_base) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = a.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1),0) ELSE 0 END)) / 2204.5855379, 0) aug_ton, ROUND(SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 9 THEN NVL((SELECT SUM(ssu.unit_net_weight_base) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = a.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1),0) ELSE 0 END)) / 2204.5855379, 0) sep_ton, ROUND(SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 10 THEN NVL((SELECT SUM(ssu.unit_net_weight_base) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = a.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1),0) ELSE 0 END)) / 2204.5855379, 0) oct_ton, ROUND(SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 11 THEN NVL((SELECT SUM(ssu.unit_net_weight_base) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = a.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1),0) ELSE 0 END)) / 2204.5855379, 0) nov_ton, ROUND(SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 12 THEN NVL((SELECT SUM(ssu.unit_net_weight_base) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = a.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1),0) ELSE 0 END)) / 2204.5855379, 0) dec_ton, COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 1 THEN a.shipment_gid END) jan_cnt, COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 2 THEN a.shipment_gid END) feb_cnt, COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 3 THEN a.shipment_gid END) mar_cnt, COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 4 THEN a.shipment_gid END) apr_cnt, COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 5 THEN a.shipment_gid END) may_cnt, COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 6 THEN a.shipment_gid END) jun_cnt, COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 7 THEN a.shipment_gid END) jul_cnt, COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 8 THEN a.shipment_gid END) aug_cnt, COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 9 THEN a.shipment_gid END) sep_cnt, COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 10 THEN a.shipment_gid END) oct_cnt, COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 11 THEN a.shipment_gid END) nov_cnt, COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 12 THEN a.shipment_gid END) dec_cnt FROM (SELECT DISTINCT sref.shipment_refnum_value shp_loc, s.shipment_gid, s.sail_date FROM shipment s INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON s.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN ob_order_base oob ON ssul.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid INNER JOIN shipment_refnum sref ON s.shipment_gid = sref.shipment_gid AND sref.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOC_CODE' WHERE s.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/BCO' AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND oob.order_base_xid like 'S%' AND TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'YYYY')) = TO_NUMBER(:YEAR)) a GROUP BY a.shp_loc ORDER BY a.shp_loc

SELECT ROUND(SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 1 THEN NVL((SELECT SUM(ssu.unit_net_weight_base) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = a.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1),0) ELSE 0 END)) / 2204.5855379, 0) jan_tont, ROUND(SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 2 THEN NVL((SELECT SUM(ssu.unit_net_weight_base) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = a.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1),0) ELSE 0 END)) / 2204.5855379, 0) feb_tont, ROUND(SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 3 THEN NVL((SELECT SUM(ssu.unit_net_weight_base) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = a.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1),0) ELSE 0 END)) / 2204.5855379, 0) mar_tont, ROUND(SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 4 THEN NVL((SELECT SUM(ssu.unit_net_weight_base) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = a.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1),0) ELSE 0 END)) / 2204.5855379, 0) apr_tont, ROUND(SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 5 THEN NVL((SELECT SUM(ssu.unit_net_weight_base) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = a.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1),0) ELSE 0 END)) / 2204.5855379, 0) may_tont, ROUND(SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 6 THEN NVL((SELECT SUM(ssu.unit_net_weight_base) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = a.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1),0) ELSE 0 END)) / 2204.5855379, 0) jun_tont, ROUND(SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 7 THEN NVL((SELECT SUM(ssu.unit_net_weight_base) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = a.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1),0) ELSE 0 END)) / 2204.5855379, 0) jul_tont, ROUND(SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 8 THEN NVL((SELECT SUM(ssu.unit_net_weight_base) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = a.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1),0) ELSE 0 END)) / 2204.5855379, 0) aug_tont, ROUND(SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 9 THEN NVL((SELECT SUM(ssu.unit_net_weight_base) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = a.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1),0) ELSE 0 END)) / 2204.5855379, 0) sep_tont, ROUND(SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 10 THEN NVL((SELECT SUM(ssu.unit_net_weight_base) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = a.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1),0) ELSE 0 END)) / 2204.5855379, 0) oct_tont, ROUND(SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 11 THEN NVL((SELECT SUM(ssu.unit_net_weight_base) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT tag_3 IS NULL WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = a.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1),0) ELSE 0 END)) / 2204.5855379, 0) nov_tont, ROUND(SUM((CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 12 THEN NVL((SELECT SUM(ssu.unit_net_weight_base) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = a.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1),0) ELSE 0 END)) / 2204.5855379, 0) dec_tont, COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 1 THEN a.shipment_gid END) jan_cntt, COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 2 THEN a.shipment_gid END) feb_cntt, COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 3 THEN a.shipment_gid END) mar_cntt, COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 4 THEN a.shipment_gid END) apr_cntt, COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 5 THEN a.shipment_gid END) may_cntt, COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 6 THEN a.shipment_gid END) jun_cntt, COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 7 THEN a.shipment_gid END) jul_cntt, COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 8 THEN a.shipment_gid END) aug_cntt, COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 9 THEN a.shipment_gid END) sep_cntt, COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 10 THEN a.shipment_gid END) oct_cntt, COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 11 THEN a.shipment_gid END) nov_cntt, COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.sail_date,'MM')) = 12 THEN a.shipment_gid END) dec_cntt FROM (SELECT DISTINCT s.shipment_gid, s.sail_date FROM shipment s INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON s.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN ob_order_base oob ON ssul.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid INNER JOIN shipment_refnum sref ON s.shipment_gid = sref.shipment_gid AND sref.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOC_CODE' WHERE s.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/BCO' AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND oob.order_base_xid like 'S%' AND TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'YYYY')) = TO_NUMBER(:YEAR)) a

SELECT oref.ob_refnum_value u_loc, ROUND(SUM( (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(oline.late_delivery_date,'MM')) = 1 THEN oline.weight_base - NVL((SELECT SUM(ssu.unit_net_weight_base) FROM s_ship_unit_line ssul INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT tag_3 IS NULL WHERE ssul.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid),0) ELSE 0 END)) / 2204.5855379, 0) jan_uton, ROUND(SUM( (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(oline.late_delivery_date,'MM')) = 2 THEN oline.weight_base - SELECT oref.ob_refnum_value s_loc, ROUND(SUM( (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(oline.late_delivery_date,'MM')) = 1 THEN oline.weight_base ELSE 0 END)) / 2204.5855379, 0) jan_ston, ROUND(SUM( (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(oline.late_delivery_date,'MM')) = 2 THEN oline.weight_base ELSE 0 END)) / 2204.5855379, 0) feb_ston, ROUND(SUM( (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(oline.late_delivery_date,'MM')) = 3 THEN oline.weight_base ELSE 0 END)) / 2204.5855379, 0) mar_ston, ROUND(SUM( (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(oline.late_delivery_date,'MM')) = 4 THEN oline.weight_base ELSE 0 END)) / 2204.5855379, 0) apr_ston, ROUND(SUM( (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(oline.late_delivery_date,'MM')) = 5 THEN oline.weight_base ELSE 0 END)) / 2204.5855379, 0) may_ston, ROUND(SUM( (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(oline.late_delivery_date,'MM')) = 6 THEN oline.weight_base ELSE 0 END)) / 2204.5855379, 0) jun_ston, ROUND(SUM( (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(oline.late_delivery_date,'MM')) = 7 THEN oline.weight_base ELSE 0 END)) / 2204.5855379, 0) jul_ston, ROUND(SUM( (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(oline.late_delivery_date,'MM')) = 8 THEN oline.weight_base ELSE 0 END)) / 2204.5855379, 0) aug_ston, ROUND(SUM( (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(oline.late_delivery_date,'MM')) = 9 THEN oline.weight_base ELSE 0 END)) / 2204.5855379, 0) sep_ston, ROUND(SUM( (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(oline.late_delivery_date,'MM')) = 10 THEN oline.weight_base ELSE 0 END)) / 2204.5855379, 0) oct_ston, ROUND(SUM( (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(oline.late_delivery_date,'MM')) = 11 THEN oline.weight_base ELSE 0 END)) / 2204.5855379, 0) nov_ston, ROUND(SUM( (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(oline.late_delivery_date,'MM')) = 12 THEN oline.weight_base ELSE 0 END)) / 2204.5855379, 0) dec_ston FROM ob_order_base oob INNER JOIN ob_line oline ON oob.order_base_gid = oline.order_base_gid INNER JOIN ob_refnum oref ON oob.order_base_gid = oref.order_base_gid AND oref.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOC_CODE' WHERE oob.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/BCO' AND oob.order_base_xid LIKE 'S%' AND TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(oline.late_delivery_date,'YYYY')) = TO_NUMBER(:YEAR) AND NOT (EXISTS (SELECT ob_refnum_value FROM ob_refnum WHERE ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CLOSE/REOPEN' AND ob_refnum_value = 'CLOSE' AND order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid) AND NOT oline.dest_location_gid IN (SELECT location_gid FROM location_refnum WHERE location_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.PORT_OR_RAMP' AND location_refnum_value = 'Y')) GROUP BY oref.ob_refnum_value ORDER BY oref.ob_refnum_value
